course.title: Primate Behavior Lab
course.description: In this class, we will collaboratively design a data collection protocol to answer questions of interest to both students and zookeepers regarding the Franklin Park Zoo gorillas, collect behavioral data at the Franklin Park Zoo (students will need to be able to commit to 5-6 hours of data collection during those weeks), analyze our behavioral data, write up study results in the format of a publishable scientific paper, and create a scientific meetings-style poster presentation of study results to be shared with the staff of the Franklin Park Zoo.
course.prerequisites: Suggested prerequisites are HEB 1330, HEB 1329 or equivalent.
course.notes: Signature of instructor is required to enroll. Enrollment will be limited to 8students. Class meeting time to be changed as needed.
